RenderProp:
import { Splitter } from '@ark-ui/react'

const RenderProp = () => (
  <Splitter.Root
    defaultSize={[
      { id: 'a', size: 50 },
      { id: 'b', size: 50 },
    ]}
  >
    <Splitter.Context>
      {(context) => (
        <>
          <Splitter.Panel id="a">
            <button onClick={() => context.setSize('a', 10)}>Set to 10%</button>
          </Splitter.Panel>
          <Splitter.ResizeTrigger id="a:b" />
          <Splitter.Panel id="b">
            <button onClick={() => context.setSize('b', 10)}>Set to 10%</button>
          </Splitter.Panel>
        </>
      )}
    </Splitter.Context>
  </Splitter.Root>
)
Vertical:
import { Splitter } from '@ark-ui/react'

const Vertical = () => (
  <Splitter.Root
    orientation="vertical"
    defaultSize={[
      { id: 'a', size: 50 },
      { id: 'b', size: 50 },
    ]}
  >
    <Splitter.Panel id="a">A</Splitter.Panel>
    <Splitter.ResizeTrigger id="a:b" />
    <Splitter.Panel id="b">B</Splitter.Panel>
  </Splitter.Root>
)
